title: Behavior-Based Project Design for Advanced Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language skills (reading, writing, listening, speaking)
context.additional_context: Real-life language application and job-linked project execution

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and integrate language materials relevant to the project topic with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can revise and improve language projects three or more times based on peer feedback.
Learners can independently complete four or more language tasks requiring higher-order thinking (comparison/analysis/evaluation).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
